Name: Super Dream-Weaver
About the game: A minimalistic retro RPG with auto-battle in mind; Battle, Craft, and build the character of your dreams! CORE FEATURES Turn-Based Battles with optional auto-battle Crafting, Item & Resource Management Min-Max gear with over a dozen stats available Procedurally generated areas and dungeons
